reviewText: faltou certificado
没有学习证书！！！差评！！！
翻译有很多问题，导致测验的问题意义不明
课程内容很棒，但是汉化有很多问题
翻译质量糟糕，无课件或辅助资料下载
課程不錯，學了很多新知識，每個章節不會太長，可輕鬆學習以下為缺點：中文翻譯不到位，有些用詞看不懂，筆記型電腦(notebook)翻譯成記事本。考題方面有時英文有時中文，很雜亂

The course content is very good and useful. But the so-called "Chinese version" doesn't fit my need. It takes longer time for me to understand the quiz and find more information relative to the quiz items from Chinese materials. Exactly the course itself is clear enough to understand, but the quiz part doubles the difficulties to comprehend.
课讲得不错。就是太简单，所学有限。
If the quiz and exam can be selected between chinese and english, it could be much better. Some questions in exams just get harder due to the inacurracy of translation into chinese.
you can understand through simple examples. However it's a bit complicated when you do the final exam. ㄋ
A little boring
教授生动形象的使用大量例子来阐述观点和原理，作为博弈论入门非常棒，后半部分关于企业决策的部分也同样很好，建议感兴趣的同学继续后续选择高级竞争策略学习。
内容 不详细  答题有点难
It's a good course for the basic study
一些题目的中文翻译存在语法问题，或者表述不清。

I wanted to ask but it is not possible (there are not chat or discussión). I think this course is interesting but I need to learn more english first and I realy realy want to know it, How I can to know the profits (payoffs) by my company?
J'aime bien ce cours, le professeur est très sympa. Il fait des plans clairs mais hors les contenus, il faut lire beaucoup des ressources complémentaire pour les bien comprendre.
simple charming
讲的很好容易明白。
very good course to let you know how is the strategy, and how you set up the strategy

This course has given me great help, so that I can use the correct methods in the future enterprise development and facing the competition. Each chapter of the course is very practical and useful. Thank you very much to the teacher, school and online course platform that provided this course.
a very interesting course.
in this lecture, i learn about the basic of market entry strategy and how to maximize the profit in market

Great course. Easy to understand and very practical.
很好
讲解深入浅出，且结合大量例子帮助理解。课程视频中及每个模块后都有测验帮助巩固所学知识。

The teacher's explanation is very logical, and the content of the course is full and of moderate difficulty. By studying this course, you can have a holistic understanding of competitive strategy analysis.Very grateful to the professor for bringing us such a good course
非经济学类的学生获益匪浅，学到了很多经济学的知识，英文也有提高，虽然感觉老师的口音怪怪的，当作是练习听力了。perfect！
Thanks for your course!
Really helpful， thanks a lot
非常推荐
很好的课程，很多详实的例子帮助了解本来很晦涩的概念，帮助学习者对竞争策略有了初步的了解和认识。
Verygood for bd beginnner
老师将博弈论的相关概念解释的简单易懂，辅以实例，更容易建立相关概念。但本课程只是介绍博弈论中浅层的理论与概念，更多的知识需要自己的思考及课下学习。从每次的课后测试就可见一斑。出于对这门课的兴趣，我又注册了高阶竞争策略，希望自己的相关知识能更上一个台阶。
pretty good
wonderful
love the way professor lead me. easy to understand the core idea of these theories.
挺好的， 学习了好多新的只是

Thanks a lot.
Very good! The teacher is very humorous hahaha.

我很喜欢这门课程，让我对竞争有了全新看法，可以更加理性和逻辑性的做出决策。
Lots of examples make the lectures interesting and easy to understand.

Good job! It's an interesting and easily understood course for people like me who hasn't learnt before the competition strategy. Just a suggestion, could you please change the translated quiz into the original english quiz? Maybe it would be better to fellow and solve the questions. Thanks.
